description.ko: 어두운 바다의 무중력 포옹 속에서 느리고 고요한 춤을 추는 천상의 빛의 존재들.
description.en: Ethereal beings of light performing a slow, silent dance in the weightless embrace of the dark ocean.

prompt: A swarm of translucent, bioluminescent jellyfish shaped like crystalline chandeliers drifting through a midnight ocean. Detailed fluid simulation with rising bubbles and intricate caustic patterns projected onto the sea floor. Focus on deep-sea translucency and membrane textures. 8k, Octane Render. Raytraced caustics, volumetric underwater lighting, and subsurface scattering on the jellyfish bells. The atmosphere is peaceful yet mysterious, with global illumination from the creatures themselves lighting the dark water.
